   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Mighty Python
============================================

Mighty Python is a list of Python micro demos (no more than 10 lines).

-------------------------

   :maxdepth: 2

   setup


Python modules mini demos
-------------------------

   :maxdepth: 2

   Demo_python
